item.title: Tested distributions under WSL2
item.description: The following distributions I have installed/created, tested and used under WSL2 and Windows 10.

item.title: Any Linux distribution on Windows 10 with WSL2
item.description: Introduction # WSL 2 on Windows 10 introduced the ability to run a native linux kernel on your computer while using Windows 10 as your main operating system.

item.title: Gentoo on Windows with WSL2
item.description: Introduction # WSL 2 on Windows 10 introduced the ability to run a native linux kernel on your computer while using Windows 10 as your main operating system.
